title: Quick Salmon Skewers
ingredients: ['350g salmon fillets, about 2cm thick, cut into 5cm strips', '5 tablespoons lemon juice', '60ml white wine', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 pinch crushed chilli flakes', '4 tablespoons olive oil']
